original_text: When I punish you like that, you will have no food to eat. Parents will be so hungry that they will eat their children. Children will eat their parents. I will chase away those few people who are still alive. They will go to all parts of the earth.
korean_text: 그리한즉 네 가운데에서 아버지가 아들을 잡아먹고 아들이 그 아버지를 잡아먹으리라 내가 벌을 네게 내리고 너희 중에 남은 자를 다 사방에 흩으리라

sentences.original_text: When I punish you like that
you will have no food to eat
that they will eat their children
I will chase away those few people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 적은 사람들을 쫓아낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will go to all parts of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 모든 부분으로 갈 것이다
